content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had this conversation with Mister Peter Schmidt.
name: Yi-Nuo

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of this conversation was the negotiation of the rental price for an apartment in Duisburg.
name: Yi-Nuo

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If no, why did you not agree on a final price?
name: Evaluator

content: The reason for not agreeing on a final price was that I, as the potential tenant, felt that the prices offered by the landlord were not high enough for such a prime location.
name: Yi-Nuo

content: On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikeable and 10 being very likeable, how would you rate the likeability of the negotiation partner? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: Why would you rate the likeability of the negotiation partner as 10?
name: Evaluator

content: I rated the likeability of the negotiation partner as 10 because the interaction was respectful, professional, and courteous. Despite not reaching an agreement on the rental price, I did not find any issues with the negotiation process or the behavior of the other party.
name: Yi-Nuo

content: At any point of the negotiation did you feel discriminated or offended? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator
